ygData.subject: Re: RE: skill cap + grow up all of you
ygData.msgSnippet: Listen .... for any of you who remember thewhitemage   I certainly do not want to become someone who was as shuned from the list as he was.... I said people
ygData.messageBody:
Listen .... for any of you who remember thewhitemage I certainly do not
want to become someone who was as shuned from the list as he was.... I said
people like him piss me off because he is so wrong and when they start
throwing in that they talked to a GM and this and that people tend to belive
you and it pisses me off when people feed disimformation weather it is
immature or not..... thank you..... now I feel young again.
Diablokilr
